atk-s0402a61:2_0: 254-256. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame abhiññāyāti jānitvā. Samatho ca vipassanā cāti cittekaggatā
atk-s0402a61:2_1: ca saṅkhārapariggahavipassanāñāṇañca. Vijjā ca vimutti cāti maggañāṇavijjā ca sesā
atk-s0402a61:2_2: sampayuttakadhammā ca. Dutiye anariyapariyesanāti anariyānaṁ esanā gavesanā. Jarādhammanti
atk-s0402a61:2_3: jarāsabhāvaṁ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tatiyaṁ uttānameva.
atk-s0402a61:4_0: 257. Catutthe mālukyaputtoti mālukyabrāhmaṇiyā putto. Etthāti etasmiṁ tava ovādayācane.
atk-s0402a61:4_1: Iminā theraṁ apasādetipi ussādetipi. Kathaṁ? Ayaṁ kira daharakāle paccayesu laggo
atk-s0402a61:4_2: hutvā pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṁ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṁ yācati. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0402a61:4_3: “ettha dahare kiṁ vakkhāma, mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle paccayesu laggitvā
atk-s0402a61:4_4: mahallakakāle araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṁ kareyyāthā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto
atk-s0402a61:4_5: theraṁ apasādeti nāma. Yasmā pana thero mahallakakāleva araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0402a61:4_6: kātukāmo, tasmā bhagavā “ettha dahare kiṁ vakkhāma, ayaṁ amhākaṁ mālukyaputto mahallakakālepi
atk-s0402a61:4_7: araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṁ kātukāmo kammaṭṭhānaṁ yācati. Tumhe tāva taruṇakālepi
atk-s0402a61:4_8: vīriyaṁ na karothā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṁ ussādeti nāmāti yojanā.
atk-s0402a61:6_0: 258-263. Pañcame ādhipacce ṭhapentīti bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhapenti. Chaṭṭhe vaṇṇasampannoti
atk-s0402a61:6_1: sarīravaṇṇena samannāgato. Balasampannoti kāyabalena samannāgato. Bhikkhuvāre vaṇṇasampannoti
atk-s0402a61:6_2: guṇavaṇṇena samannāgato. Balasampannoti vīriyabalena samannāgato. Javasampannoti
atk-s0402a61:6_3: ñāṇajavena samannāgato. Sattamepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
